section.p: A piece of equipment and or a mechanism designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function. This class represents devices used to perform a surgery, such as lasers, as well as devices that might be implanted in the patient as a result of the surgery, such as a prosthesis or a stent.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] deviceId with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the device as assigned by the owner of the device (as opposed to the lotOrSerialId, which is assigned by the manufacturer.

Contains exactly one [1..1] deviceName with data type Code
The descriptive name for the Surgical device being used.

Contains exactly one [1..1] deviceType with data type Code
Provices a categorization of the device.

Contains zero or one [0..1] lotId with data type Id
Identifies the manufacturing lot during which this device was produced. This property is optional, as it generally applies to commodity items rather than specialized equipment, which would use the serial Id instead.

Contains exactly one [1..1] model with data type Code
Manufacturers model name or number for the surgical device

Contains exactly one [1..1] quantity with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the number of device(s) involved in the surgical procedure

Contains zero or one [0..1] serialId with data type Id
A unique identifier assigned by the manufacture of the device. This property is optional, as commodity items are typically not uniquely identified, but may be associated with a manufacturing lot instead. This property is particularly important for prosthetic devices.
